Early Access Review
								Very fun and addicting game! I love the global leaderboard! I finally made it to the first level boss and I am going to enjoy beating that boss with great satisfaction one day. Great game! Can't wait for more additions to this game!

Posted: October 19, 2016
Early Access Review
								What can I say, quite a fun and enjoyable game. It looks great, the different ships are all beautifully designed. The world rankings are there to♥♥♥♥♥♥me off every single time I can't beat them. It put me right in that competitive mode...ready to beat anyone and have my name on top of all others. As an Early access game it's fantastic. Great job and I can't wait to see where it goes from here.
